Elaine.Action: Hobbles in and out of darkness, removes clothes, revealing a fragile naked body, then moves back into shadow.
Carefully extracts a mossy clump from the ceiling above the baby, allowing moonlight to shine on the child.
Handles a large rusty knife and performs a swift motion over the baby, presumably to perform a ritualistic act.
Grinds contents in a mortar and pestle with messy earth jars around, indicating some preparation of substances.
Rubs thick bloody grease (unguent) over her own body and the broomstick handle, preparing for an important action.
Mounts the broomstick and makes controlled movements of her head, signaling readiness and focus.
Reaches out symphathetically, beckons Caleb, smiles sweetly, strokes his head, embraces him, kisses him sensually.
